name: Easy Anagrammed Australasian Capitals Trivia Quiz | Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Rearrange the words in capital letters to reveal the capital city of either a country or Australian state or territory.  A single capital letter at the beginning of a sentence or word will not be part of the anagram unless the entire word is capitalised.  The hint will let you know if you are looking the capital of a state, territory or country.


ONE could hear trains RUMBLE through Flinders Street Station in this capital city.
BY listening to PROMOTERS, you may be tempted to visit the popular fresh produce market in this city's region of Koki.
You could relax in a BAR with a HOT chocolate as you watched the sun set on the Derwent River in this city.
It would be a nice IDEA to LEAD a walking tour around this city of churches.
If this were a TEST, THEN you might LET ME tell you that this capital city is also known by the name Flying Fish Cove.
NO GENT WILL pass up the opportunity to sample the cafe culture in this capital city.
Its proximity to numerous natural wonders will DRAW IN many tourists to this city.
It would not BE stretching the truth to say that many people strain their BRAINS to find a reason to stay in this sprawling sub-tropical city.
IT is NEWS to many LADS that this capital city is situated about halfway between Australia and Sri Lanka.
If you are anywhere NEAR this city, you may want to have a meal in the famous "Kingsley CRAB and Steakhouse".
